response.overview: Kashi from Village (also known as Kashi) is a 2005 Indian Kannada-language action film film directed by Om Sai Prakash, starring Sudeepa and Rakshita. The film features background score and soundtrack composed by Koti and lyrics by K. Kalyan. The film was released on 1 April 2005. It is a remake of the Tamil film Bagavathi (2002).
response.title: Kashi from Village
